name: Santa Wants You
description:
Santa is visiting your house to leave your present. But you know you've been very naughty this year and that he's gonna leave you coal (you think that's his plan).

DON´T LET HIM IN

How to play:

  • Place planks on the window when Santa breaks them. Pick them from the basket near the fireplace
  • Place a plank in the fire to ignite it when Santa blows it out
  • Shoot the elves. Too many of them and they will grab you

This game was made for the GDT Christmas Jam 2022 by:

  • Afonso Cunha (Art)
  • Beatriz Azevedo (Art)
  • Eduardo Espadeiro (Programmer)
  • José Siopa (Programmer)

We are members of GameDev Técnico
